_comment: The possible paywall values are 'meter' (wall after 5), 'paywall' (wall immediately), or 'free' (no wall)

PROJECT._comment: IMPORTANT: SUBFOLDER and SLUG for used for file pathing and the deploy script! Take care with your edits to them! NOTE: Stage deploys will automatically go to 'test-proj'
PROJECT.SEO_TITLE: Interactive Map: California danger zones for earthquakes, fires, floods
PROJECT.SOCIAL_TITLE: Interactive Map: California danger zones for earthquakes, fires, floods
PROJECT.DESCRIPTION: This map highlights the risk areas in California for three major natural disasters: earthquakes, fires and floods.
PROJECT.TWITTER_TEXT: California Danger Zones: Mapping high risk areas for quakes, fires and floods
